quote: The magic you are looking for is in the work you are avoiding
We fall to the standards we have when no one is watching
Best way to end something is to starve it
Life is 10% what happens , and 90% how you react to it
Act according to your principle , not your mood
Discipline is conditioning of brain when something needs to get done , it should get done
Missing one day is a mistake , missing another is starting of a new habit
Everytime you break promise to yourself , it shows your words doest matter
Create evidence to back what you say you are
Your habits echos you future louder than you
The smarter you are , the better your excuses
